sect1.title: PoD Version Number Scheme
sect1.para:
PoD version has a form of MAJOR.MINOR(.PATCH), where:
MAJOR - the major number is increased when there are significant jumps in functionality.
MINOR - the minor number is incremented when only minor features or significant fixes have been added.
PATCH - represents a number of commits (patches) to a current major.minor pair.

note.para: Starting with version 3.4, PoD changes its version numbering. It reflects the fact that PoD is both a production system and a research project. PoD now uses odd minor version numbers to denote development releases and even minor version numbers to denote stable releases.
